headline: ComEd Keeps Power Affordable and Reliable for Customers, While Delivering Clean Energy Advancements in 2025
summary: CHICAGO, January 27, 2026--ComEd achieved pivotal advancements in 2025 to meet the energy needs of over 9 million people across northern Illinois.
